title: 服开不起来，请帮我看看原因，在线等
author: aqizidi
txt_content:
昨天服务商在搞什么测 试，到凌晨三四点都没好我就去睡了，结果到现在都没好，服开不起来，那逗比服务商自个美滋滋的睡觉去了，控制台最后的几行内容是


09.02 08:34:28 [Server] INFO Read timed out
09.02 08:24:35 [Server] INFO Purged accounts with default balance.
09.02 08:24:35 [Server] INFO Enabling CoreProtect v2.0.8
09.02 08:24:35 [Server] INFO Plugin aktiviert!
09.02 08:24:35 [Server] INFO Version 1.6.3
09.02 08:24:35 [Server] INFO Plugin by [Klon160]
09.02 08:24:35 [Server] INFO Enabling LogAll v1.6.3
09.02 08:24:35 [Server] INFO Hello, I'm Nijikokun. Yes, this is an April Fools joke, but '/money top' was fixed! Enjoy :) - Rare Version!


大家帮我看看是服务商的问题，还是我的问题

replies.author: aa791598204
replies.txt_content:
Read timed out
读取超时，应该是服务商的问题...

replies.txt_content:
